dialogs.answer: WordPad is a simple word processing software which allows the users to create documents such as letters, reports, news, etc.

dialogs.text: How do you open WordPad?
dialogs.answer:
1. Click on start button.

2. Click on the program.

3. Click on Accessories.

4. Click on WordPad.

dialogs.text: Where do you enter the text in WordPad?
dialogs.answer: That white space is where you enter text.

dialogs.text: How to create a new document by using the shortcut keys?

You can do task like creating ,saving ,editing easily using shortcut keys. There are many shortcut keys.

Turn to see some important shortcut keys.
dialogs.answer:
Ctrl +N = To create new file/document

Ctrl+S= To save current file/document

Ctrl+A= To select all text

Ctrl+C = To copy selected text

Ctrl+V= To paste copied text

dialogs.text: Home-tab consist of 5 groups, What are they?
dialogs.answer: Clipboard, Font, Paragraph, Insert, and Editing.

dialogs.text: Font group helps you to style your text. It also has many shortcut keys to help you style text easily. What are they?
dialogs.answer:
Ctrl + B will Bold text.
Ctrl + I will Italicize text.
Ctrl + U will Underline text.

dialogs.text: Paragraph group has arrows and four square box with lines, What are the functions of these tools?
dialogs.answer:
Arrow will move indented, bulleted or numbered text.
The square box helps to position the text either left, right, center, or justified.

dialogs.text: What does Insert group allows the user to do?
dialogs.answer: You can insert various object and picture of your choice.

dialogs.text: What is the correct way to close WordPad?
dialogs.answer:
Always save your document first, then:

1. Choose Exit from File tab or Click on close button.

2. A dialog box appears with a message, you need to save.

3. Click Yes to save, Or click No not to save and Cancel to cancel the close command.
